title: Facebook harms children and weakens democracy: ex-employee
description: A former employee tells the US Senate that the social media giant put profit before people.

title: Ernest Johnson: Missouri executes man for killing three in 1994 robbery
description: Ernest Johnson was executed despite pleas from Pope Francis and other advocates.

title: US to combat threats of violence against teachers
description: Reports of intimidation and threats of violence against teachers rise in response to Covid rules.

title: Tesla must pay $137m to racially harassed former worker
description: A judge rules the firm did not take reasonable steps to stop a US factory worker from being abused.

title: Facebook, Whatsapp and Instagram back after outage
description: Facebook says the outage, which lasted nearly six hours, was caused by a faulty configuration change.
